00026 void DummyRoute::initialize(int stage) {
00027   BaseNetwLayer::initialize(stage);
00028   if (stage == 0) {
00029     trace = par("trace");
00030     networkID = par("networkID");
00031   }
00032 }

00034 
00035 void DummyRoute::handleLowerMsg(cMessage* msg) {
00036   DummyRoutePkt* pkt = check_and_cast<DummyRoutePkt*>(msg);
00037   if(pkt->getNetworkID()==networkID) {
00038     sendUp(decapsMsg(pkt));
00039   } else {
00040     delete pkt;
00041   }
00042 }
00043 
00044 void DummyRoute::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg) {
00045   sendControlUp(msg);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void DummyRoute::handleUpperMsg(cMessage* msg) {
00049 //  NetwControlInfo* cInfo =
00050 //      dynamic_cast<NetwControlInfo*> (msg->removeControlInfo());
00051 //  LAddress::L2Type nextHopMacAddr;
00052 //  if (cInfo == 0) {
00053 //    EV<<"DummyRoute warning: Application layer did not specifiy a destination L3 address\n"
00054 //         << "\tusing broadcast address instead\n";
00055 //    nextHopMacAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00056 //  } else {
00057 //    nextHopMacAddr = arp->getMacAddr(cInfo->getNetwAddr());
00058 //  }
00059 //  LAddress::setL3ToL2ControlInfo(msg, myNetwAddr, nextHopMacAddr);
00060   sendDown(encapsMsg(check_and_cast<cPacket*>(msg)));
00061 }
00062 
00063 void DummyRoute::finish() {
00064 }
00065 
00066 NetwPkt* DummyRoute::encapsMsg(cPacket *appPkt) {
00067     LAddress::L2Type macAddr;
00068     LAddress::L3Type netwAddr;
00069 
00070     debugEV <<"in encaps...\n";
00071 
00072     DummyRoutePkt *pkt = new DummyRoutePkt(appPkt->getName(), appPkt->getKind());
00073     pkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00074 
00075     cObject* cInfo = appPkt->removeControlInfo();
00076 
00077     if(cInfo == NULL){
00078     EV << "warning: Application layer did not specifiy a destination L3 address\n"
00079      << "\tusing broadcast address instead\n";
00080     netwAddr = LAddress::L3BROADCAST;
00081     } else {
00082     debugEV <<"CInfo removed, netw addr="<< NetwControlInfo::getAddressFromControlInfo( cInfo ) << endl;
00083     netwAddr = NetwControlInfo::getAddressFromControlInfo( cInfo );
00084     delete cInfo;
00085     }
00086 
00087     pkt->setNetworkID(networkID);
00088     pkt->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00089     pkt->setDestAddr(netwAddr);
00090     debugEV << " netw "<< myNetwAddr << " sending packet" <<endl;
00091     if(LAddress::isL3Broadcast(netwAddr)) {
00092         debugEV << "sendDown: nHop=L3BROADCAST -> message has to be broadcasted"
00093            << " -> set destMac=L2BROADCAST\n";
00094         macAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00095     }
00096     else{
00097         debugEV <<"sendDown: get the MAC address\n";
00098         macAddr = arp->getMacAddr(netwAddr);
00099     }
00100 
00101     setDownControlInfo(pkt, macAddr);
00102 
00103     //encapsulate the application packet
00104     pkt->encapsulate(appPkt);
00105     debugEV <<" pkt encapsulated\n";
00106     return pkt;
00107 }
00108 
00109 cPacket* DummyRoute::decapsMsg(NetwPkt *msg) {
00110   cPacket *m = msg->decapsulate();
00111   setUpControlInfo(m, msg->getSrcAddr());
00112     // delete the netw packet
00113   delete msg;
00114   return m;
00115 }
